smpub
  • smpub - Smart Publisher
  • Edit on GitHub

smpub - Smart PublisherÔÉÅ

CLI/API framework based on SmartSwitch

Build CLI and API applications with automatic command dispatch using SmartSwitch.

FeaturesÔÉÅ

  • üéØ Publisher Pattern - Register handlers and expose them via CLI/API

  • üîÄ SmartSwitch Integration - Rule-based function dispatch

  • üíª CLI Generation - Automatic command-line interface

  • ‚úÖ Pydantic Validation - Automatic type validation and conversion

  • üé® Interactive Mode - Optional questionary-based parameter prompting

  • üåê HTTP/API Mode - FastAPI integration with Swagger UI

  • üìù Registry System - Local/global app registration

  • üèóÔ∏è Clean API - Simple decorator-based handler definition

Quick StartÔÉÅ

InstallationÔÉÅ

pip install smpub

# With HTTP support
pip install smpub[http]

# Interactive mode uses questionary (install separately)
pip install questionary

Basic ExampleÔÉÅ

from smpub import Publisher, PublishedClass
from smartswitch import Switcher

class UserHandler(PublishedClass):
    __slots__ = ('users',)
    api = Switcher(prefix='user_')

    def __init__(self):
        self.users = {}

    @api
    def user_add(self, name: str, email: str) -> str:
        """Add a new user."""
        self.users[name] = email
        return f"User {name} added"

    @api
    def user_list(self) -> list:
        """List all users."""
        return list(self.users.keys())

class MainClass(Publisher):
    def initialize(self):
        self.users = UserHandler()
        self.publish('users', self.users, cli=True, openapi=True)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = MainClass()
    app.run()  # Auto-detect CLI or HTTP mode

CLI ModeÔÉÅ

# Run commands
python myapp.py users add john john@example.com
python myapp.py users list

# Interactive mode
python myapp.py users add --interactive

HTTP ModeÔÉÅ

# Start HTTP server
python myapp.py

# Access Swagger UI
open http://localhost:8000/docs

Part of Genro-Libs FamilyÔÉÅ

smpub is part of the Genro-Libs toolkit, a collection of general-purpose Python developer tools.

Related Projects:

  • smartswitch - Rule-based function dispatch (used by smpub)

  • gtext - Text transformation tool
